Title: Creates specific computer crimes as well as increasing penalties for crimes committed with the aid of a computer
Summary: Creates specific computer crimes as well as increasing penalties for crimes committed with the aid of a computer; provides for civil relief in cases of pornography on the internet, and penal sanctions in such cases.
LawCode: Amd Pen L, generally; amd §§200.50 & 700.05, CP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the criminal procedure law, in relation to computer crimes and obscenities
